td.a: Do you have pictures to share with the LHS 2019-2020 Yearbook?

img.alt: Do you have pictures to share with the LHS 2019-2020 Yearbook?

img.br: Virtual Awards Ceremony was held on Thursday, April 16, 2020 at 3 PM.
Ann.Staff@k12.nd.us is the email for the yearbook so PLEASE send in your SENSATIONAL SHADES pics! Click to see the Sensations!
